App Name: Shards of Magic

Brief: Dive into the spectacular world of "Shards of Magic," a captivating strategy game that enchants with its stunning 3D visual effects. Boasting over 350 intricately designed levels, each is brimming with its own unique set of challenges. Players have the freedom to select and arm their preferred characters, tailoring their gameplay experience with a variety of roles, each possessing distinct skills. Embrace the challenge and exploit enemy weaknesses to fortify your team and claim victory in this enthralling strategic conquest.
